service_statistics.clientdatatotal: داده های مشتری منتقل شده است

dashboard.sqlite: سرور از پایگاه داده SQLite استفاده می کند که برای این سرویس کافی نیست. لطفاً قبل از فعال کردن این سرویس Groupware را پیکربندی کنید تا از سرور پایگاه داده مستقل (به عنوان مثال MySQL ، MS SQL ، Oracle) استفاده کند.
dashboard.upgrade: برنامه ریزی های خود را به روز رسانی کنید

generic.enter_additional_alias: نام مستعار اضافی را وارد کنید
generic.enter_time_in_minutes: زمان را به دقیقه وارد نمایید
generic.name: نام
generic.reset_to_default: تنظیم مجدد به حالت پیش فرض
generic.select_action: عمل مورد نظر را انتخاب کنید
generic.subject: موضوع

client_applications_help.client_applications: دستگاه های تلفن همراه کاربر ، برنامه های Outlook Sync و Desktop Client را مدیریت کنید.
client_applications_help.icewarp_desktop: نصب Desktop Client را بارگیری کرده و مجوزها را مدیریت کنید.
client_applications_help.icewarp_outlook_sync: نصب Outlook Sync را بارگیری کنید و تنظیمات و صدور مجوز را از راه دور مدیریت کنید.
client_applications_help.mobile_devices: تنظیمات دستگاه های همراه متصل را مدیریت کنید.

permissions.add_new_user_or_domain: اضافه کردن دامنه یا کاربر جدید

permissions_help.inbox: به سایر کاربران شرکتتان اجازه دهید ایمیل را بخوانند یا در پوشه پیش فرض ایمیل تغییراتی ایجاد کنند.
permissions_help.calendar: به سایر کاربران شرکتتان اجازه دهید رویدادها را در پوشه پیش فرض تقویم مشاهده یا ایجاد کنند.
permissions_help.contacts: به سایر کاربران شرکتتان اجازه دهید ورودی های موجود در پوشه پیش فرض مخاطبین را لیست یا تغییر دهند.
permissions_help.files: به سایر کاربران شرکتتان اجازه دهید اسناد را در پوشه پیش فرض پرونده ها بخوانند یا اضافه کنند.

mobile_devices.merge_to_default_calendar_folder: در پوشه تقویم پیش فرض ادغام شوید

devicedetail.soft_hard_wipe: دستگاه را از راه دور پاک کنید
devicedetail.sync_notes_as: همگام سازی یادداشت ها به عنوان
devicedetail.sync_tasks_as_calendar_events: همگام سازی کارها به عنوان رویداد های تقویم
devicedetail.all_with_groupware_as_email: همه دارای GroupWare به عنوان ایمیل

devicedetail_help.device_info: خصوصیات دستگاه را مرور یا ویرایش کنید یا دسترسی دستگاهها به سرور را مسدود کنید.
devicedetail_help.groupware_synchronization: هماهنگ سازی GroupWare و موارد ایمیل را مدیریت کنید. در صورت لزوم ، ضامن را روشن کرده و مقدار مناسب را از لیست انتخاب کنید. این تنظیمات تنظیمات دستگاه را لغو می کند.
devicedetail_help.private_special_folders: همگام سازی پوشه های پیش فرض و ویژه را مدیریت کنید. از لیست مناسب انتخاب کنید یا ضامن را روشن کنید.
devicedetail_help.soft_hard_wipe: Soft Wipe فقط داده های بارگیری شده از سرور را پاک می کند. Hard Wipe دستگاه را به تنظیمات کارخانه بازمی گرداند ، داده ها را از دستگاه و کارتهای SD پاک می کند.

domainlist.verification_use_minger_with_password: از Minger با رمز عبور استفاده کنید
domainlist.verification_use_rcpt_to_command: از دستور RCPT TO استفاده کنید

domaindetail.name: نام
domaindetail.daily_send_out_limit_for_domain: روزانه محدودیت هایی برای دامنه ارسال می شود
domaindetail.disable_login_to_this_domain: ورود به این دامنه را غیرفعال کنید
domaindetail.delete_domain_when_expired: وقتی منقضی شد دامنه را حذف کنید
domaindetail.default_daily_send_out_limit_for_users: محدودیت پیش فرض روزانه برای ارسال کاربران
domaindetail.same_domain_helper: شما در حال تغییر نام دامنه خود هستید. پس از اتمام عملکرد ، به طور خودکار از WebAdmin خارج می شوید و باید دوباره وارد سیستم شوید.

domaindetail_help.domain_limits: محدودیت های دامنه زیر بر هر محدودیت سطح کاربر اولویت دارند. به عنوان مثال ، اگر یک محدودیت Disk Quota در دامنه ای تنظیم کنید که روی 100 مگابایت تنظیم شده و یک اندازه حساب کاربر را روی 500 مگابایت قرار دهید ، با رسیدن دامنه به 100 مگابایت ، دامنه آن محدود می شود.
domaindetail_help.domain_expiration: تاریخ انقضا برای دامنه مشخص کنید. وقتی دامنه منقضی می شود ، فقط ورود به دامنه غیرفعال است. اگر بخواهید دامنه را حذف کنید ، همه حساب ها و داده های آنها حذف می شود!
domaindetail_help.user_limits: محدودیت های زیر اولویت کمتری نسبت به هر محدودیت سطح کاربر دارند. به عنوان مثال ، اگر 100 حساب در دامنه دارید و 98 باید محدودیت یکسانی داشته باشد ، 2 مورد باید محدودیت های مختلفی داشته باشد ، برای 98 کاربر در اینجا محدودیت تعیین کنید و فقط برای 2 نفر محدودیت دیگری در سطح کاربر تعیین کنید.
domaindetail_help.quotas: برای محدود کردن اندازه دامنه ، تعداد پیام های ارسال شده یا حداکثر اندازه پیام ها در سطح دامنه ، یا اعمال محدودیت های دیگر برای همه حساب های دامنه به طور همزمان ، روی دامنه های دامنه کلیک کنید.
domaindetail_help.permissions_and_rights: نحوه مدیریت پیام های ارسالی به حساب هایی که در سرور تعریف نشده اند را مشخص کنید. برای فعال یا غیرفعال کردن سرویس ها برای همه کاربران دامنه ، روی ویژگی ها کلیک کنید. ویژگی های پیکربندی شده در سطح کاربر از اولویت بیشتری برخوردار هستند.
domaindetail_help.client_applications: دستگاه های تلفن همراه دامنه ، برنامه های Outlook Sync و Desktop Client را مدیریت کنید.
domaindetail_help.aliases: نام های مستعار این دامنه را وارد کنید. پیام های ارسال شده به همه این آدرس ها به صندوق های پستی این دامنه ارسال می شود. برای این نام های مستعار نمی توانید قوانینی متفاوت از دامنه اصلی تعیین کنید.

rules.function_contains_value_from_list: حاوی مقداری از لیست است (با ؛ جدا شده)
rules.function_contains_value_from_file: حاوی مقداری از یک پرونده یا الگو است
rules.condition_where_message_body_matches: جایی که متن پیام مطابقت دارد
rules.condition_where_message_contains_attachm: جایی که پیام حاوی پیوست است
rules.condition_where_attachment_name_matches: جایی که نام پیوست مطابقت دارد
rules.condition_where_custom_message_header_ma: جایی که سرصفحه پیام سفارشی مطابقت دارد
rules.condition_where_any_message_header_match: هر جایی که هر سرصفحه پیام مطابقت دارد
rules.condition_where_recipient_matches: جایی که گیرنده با هم مطابقت دارد
rules.condition_where_sender_recipient_is_loca: جایی که فرستنده / گیرنده محلی / از راه دور باشد
rules.condition_where_rdns_matches: جایی که RDNS ها مطابقت دارند
rules.condition_where_senders_ip_address_match: جایی که آدرس IP فرستنده مطابقت دارد
rules.condition_where_senders_ip_address_is_li: جایی که آدرس IP فرستنده در DNSBL ذکر شده است
rules.condition_where_session_is_trusted: جایی که سشن مورد اعتماد است
rules.condition_where_message_direct_to_user: پیام مستقیماً به کاربر ارسال شد
rules.action_set_message_priority_to: اولویت پیام را بر روی تنظیم کنید
rules.action_set_message_flags_to: پرچم های پیام را روی تنظیم کنید
rules.action_stop_processing_more_rules: پردازش قوانین بیشتر را متوقف کنید
rules.result_step_1: 1. ابتدا یک یا چند شرط را انتخاب کنید
rules.result_step_2: 2. برخی از اقدامات را به شرایط خود اضافه کنید
rules.result_step_3: 3. برای تمییز قانون عنوان اضافه کنید
rules.title: عنوان

rulepopup.add_new_header_condition: اضافه کردن شرط جدید در عنوان
rulepopup.match_regex: RegEx را در هدر اصلی مطابقت دهید
rulepopup.subject: موضوع

rulecard.all_items_match: همه ی آیتم ها مطابقت دارند
rulecard.message_password: پیام شامل پرونده های محافظت شده با رمز عبور است

userlist_help.list_of_all_accounts: View and manage all the domain's accounts. Click the appropriate account to open it for editing.

mailinglist.account_member_itself: Account cannot be a member of itself.
mailinglist.max_number_of_messages: Max number of messages to send out in 1 minute
mailinglist.only_members_can_post: Only members can post new messages
mailinglist.do_not_deliver: Do not deliver to members with quota exceeded

mailinglist_help.mailinglist_members: Review mailing list members, add new members or remove current ones. Tick the appropriate box and click Select Action button to remove a member.
mailinglist_help.general_details: Manage general mailing list properties. Use the Add button where applicable.
mailinglist_help.security: Manage mailing list default member rights, password and other properties.
mailinglist_help.members_source: Select how/where mailing list members are defined.
mailinglist_help.settings: Define rules for messages delivery and problematic addresses treatment.

group.account_member_itself: Account cannot be a member of itself.
group.name: Name
group.only_members_can_post: Only members can post new messages
group.do_not_deliver: Do not deliver to members with quota exceeded
group.max_number_of_messages: Max number of messages to send out in 1 minute
group.populate_gal: Populate Global Address List (GAL) with all members
group.allow_gal_export: Allow GAL export for other servers within distributed domain
group.organize_gal: Organize GAL into hierarchical address book (HAB)

group_help.group_members: Review group members, add new members or remove current ones. Tick the appropriate box and click Select Action button to remove a member.
group_help.general_details: Manage general group properties. Use the Add button to add an alias.
group_help.group_sharing: Turn the toggle on if you want to create a public folder for this group. Enter the folder name and click the Permissions button to set access rights for group members.
group_help.group_email_delivery: Select how messages to the group members are to be delivered. Select whether messages are to be delivered also to group members with account limits exceeded.
group_help.security: Set whether also non-members can post messages, whether sending a message to this group is to be password protected and set outgoing messages flow control.
group_help.populate_gal: Turn the toggle on if you want to have GroupWare contacts for all group members created.
group_help.allow_gal_export: If applicable, turn the toggle on to use a remote GAL for a distributed domain.
group_help.organize_gal: Turn the toggle on if you want to have created a hierarchical folder structure where a subgroup name is used as a folder name.
group_help.teamchat: Enables to create private and public chat rooms within this group.

accountdetail.check_password_policy: Password does not match the password policy.
accountdetail.content_of_folders: Synchronize content of the selected folders immediately after local change is detected
accountdetail.reset_authentication: Are you sure you wish to reset the two-factor authentication?
accountdetail.must_change_password: Force password change after first login
accountdetail.name: First Name
accountdetail.password_not_saved: Password was not saved. Check password policy.
accountdetail.password_policy_alpha: Number of alpha characters in password [a-z][A-Z]
accountdetail.password_policy_digits: Number of numeric characters in password [0-9]:
accountdetail.password_policy_nonalphanum: Number of non alpha-numeric characters in password [!@#$%...]:
accountdetail.password_policy_upperalpha: Number of uppercase alpha characters in password [A-Z]
accountdetail.password_policy_useralias: Password cannot contain username or alias
accountdetail.respond_to_messages: Respond to messages sent to user's email address only
accountdetail.send_key_to_user_by_email: Send key to user by email
accountdetail.user_can_send_to_local_domains_only: User can send to local domains only
accountdetail.disable_access_to_pop3: Disable access to POP3 (IMAP only account)

accountdetail_help.account_state: Select whether this account will be fully functional, partially disabled (user cannot login, but messages are accepted), disabled (user cannot login, messages are rejected) or will work as a spam trap.
accountdetail_help.activation_key: Activation Key enables user to properly license selected client application. Once generated, it is available to user through WebClient interface or via SmartSync request from client application.
accountdetail_help.address: Enter a street address or place of work.
accountdetail_help.advanced: Turn on toggles of those advanced synchronization features you want to set for this user. Enter the appropriate values.
accountdetail_help.aliases: Enter aliases for this account. Messages sent to all these addresses will be delivered to this mailbox.
accountdetail_help.antispam: Select whether this user will receive spam reports, will receive reports as set in Anti-Spam - Action - Reports, reports with new spam items listed or reports with all spam items listed. Also select whether a spam folder is to be used.
accountdetail_help.antispam_features: Comprehensive spam filtering provides users with controls over the system through Black Lists, White Lists, Spam Folders & Quarantine Reports.
accountdetail_help.antivirus: Enterprise Anti-Virus scans and validates every file going in or out of the account, be it email, calendar attachments, documents and file transfers.
accountdetail_help.appearance: Turn the toggle on and select the way how address book names are to be shown.
accountdetail_help.archive: Archiving saves all incoming and outgoing email and text messages and provides users read-only access to the Archive folder to restore lost messages.
accountdetail_help.client_applications: Manage the user's mobile devices, Outlook Sync and Desktop Client applications.
accountdetail_help.exchange_activesync: Secure synchronization of email, calendars, contacts, tasks and notes to all mobile devices including Windows Phone, iPhone, iPad and Android.
accountdetail_help.expiration: Set expiration of the user's account.
accountdetail_help.file_transfer: FTP lets users transfer large files to a dedicated storage on the server. Using a standard FTP client, users can browse, manage, upload or download files.
accountdetail_help.forwarder: Set where messages are to be forwarded or copied, separate several by semicolon. Alternate email is used during password retrieval. Incoming/outgoing copy cannot be modified by user.
accountdetail_help.general: Enter the account's information. All data presented here will be shown also in the user's GAL contact. Users can edit the fields in My Details dialog in WebClient. All fields are optional.
accountdetail_help.groupware: GroupWare needs to be enabled for users to access their public information including Global Address List, Company Calendars, Files and Public Folders.
accountdetail_help.instant_messaging: Real-time messaging or Chat enables instant communication among users, lets them share files and see each other's presence in the contact roster.
accountdetail_help.limits: Turn the toggles on and enter the appropriate values for the account limits you want to set.
accountdetail_help.note: Note to a contact (this field is usually edited by a user).
accountdetail_help.online_conferencing: WebMeetings service stimulates collaboration and drives productivity in your teams by connecting users with Audio, Multi-User Chat and Screen Sharing.
accountdetail_help.permissions_and_rights: Select whether this user is a regular email account or a server administrator or a domain administrator. Click Features to enable or disable services for this user individually.
accountdetail_help.pop_imap: System service for receiving emails needs to be enabled for proper functionality of WebClient and other email clients like Outlook, Thunderbird or Mail.
accountdetail_help.quarantine: Quarantine allows you to place suspect incoming messages in a pending queue awaiting manual authorization by administrators or users themselves.
accountdetail_help.quotas: Overview of limits for number of messages sent per day and disk space occupied by this account.
accountdetail_help.responder: Select the responder mode for this account. Other fields are enabled depending on this mode.
accountdetail_help.sms: Built-in text messaging (SMS) lets users send text messages from WebClient, reply to received messages and manage them as emails in the Inbox.
accountdetail_help.smtp: System service for sending email needs to be enabled for proper functionality of WebClient and other email clients like Outlook, Thunderbird or Mail.
accountdetail_help.synchronization: Turn on toggles of those synchronization features you want to set for this user. Enter the appropriate values.
accountdetail_help.syncml: Wireless synchronization of calendars, contacts, tasks and notes to older mobile devices based on Palm OS, Symbian and others not supporting ActiveSync.
accountdetail_help.voip: Internet telephony lets users make Audio/Video calls and join conference calls from WebClient directly or using a SIP compatible phone or application.
accountdetail_help.web_folders: External access to user's own private cloud allows to map it as a network drive in Windows/Linux/Mac and store documents, photos and other files.
accountdetail_help.webclient: Web-based access to email, calendars, contacts, tasks, notes and documents. All information may be shared among users via shared and public folders.
accountdetail_help.teamchat: TeamChat is a modern collaboration tool for teams & projects. It lets you get in touch with other people on the team, organize your conversations around one topic, share files or create ad-hoc meetings.
accountdetail_help.web_documents: Online editors of Microsoft Office and OpenOffice file formats. Create documents with beautiful formatting, stunning presentations, spreadsheets with formulas, all without leaving the WebClient.

accountdetail_placeholder.folder_synchronization_threshold: Enter maximum number of messages in the folder

synchronization.automatically_revert_changes: Automatically revert changes in read only folders

dns.name: Name
dns.academy_text: Please refer to IceWarp Academy video how to setup DNS records properly. Example zone file for your domain can be downloaded below.

dns_help.dns: Current DNS settings for your domain are listed below. Incorrect or missing entries are marked in red color.

dkim.no_selector: Please specify a unique Selector for this server
dkim.academy_title: DKIM setup tutorial in IceWarp academy
dkim.academy_text: Please refer to IceWarp Academy video how to setup DKIM records in DNS properly.

dkim_help.domain_key_selector: Any text, if you set DKIM for this domain on multiple servers, each server has to have unique selector.
dkim_help.selector_record: Configure your DNS server with the public key. You need to add the following entry into your DNS server for e.g. icecream._domainkey.www.icewarp.com.
dkim_help.wizard: DKIM is used by remote servers for verification that emails sent from this domain are not spoofed. In order to use DKIM, DNS TXT record <Selector>._domainkey.<domainname> has to be created.

certificates_help.add_existing: Choose if you already have an SSL server certificate ready.
certificates_help.new_icewarp_cert: Purchase a trusted SSL server certificate from IceWarp in a few simple steps. Reissue if expiration is due or more domains are added.
certificates_help.new_ca_cert: Generate a certificate request for use with your favorite certificate provider. Reissue if expiration is due or more domains are added.
certificates_help.new_lets_encrypt_cert: Generate a free certificate from Let's Encrypt certification authority. Certificate is automatically reissued before expiration, reissue manually if domains need to be added or removed.
certificates_help.new_self_signed_cert: Generate a free certificate not verified by any certification authority. Use if security is not a big concern. Reissue as often as needed.
certificates_help.csr: This is a Certificate Signing Request (CSR). CSR needs to be provided to the certificate authority. Once the validation process is finished, bind the certificate received from authority to the original CSR.

policies.block_user_login_accounts: Block user login for accounts that exceed a number of failed login attempts
policies.require_administrator: Require administrator authentication to access the system settings
policies.password_cannot_contain: Password cannot contain username or alias
policies.numeric: Number of numeric characters in password [0-9]
policies.non_alpha_numeric: Number of non alpha-numeric characters in password [!@#$%...]
policies.alpha: Number of alpha characters in password [a-z][A-Z]
policies.uppercase_alpha: Number of uppercase alpha characters in password [A-Z]
policies.passwords_read_exported: Passwords cannot be read or exported
policies.admin_passwords_read_exported: Administrator passwords cannot be read or exported
policies.do_not_block_but_delay: Do not block but delay authentication process
policies.block_account: Block account for specified amount of time

whitelabeling_help.login_logo: Change the logo shown on your login page. Supported image formats: JPG, PNG, GIF, SVG. Maximum file size: 20 MB.
whitelabeling_help.login_page_options: Choose which elements of login page you want to show or hide.
whitelabeling_help.login_skin: Set up how the login page looks.
whitelabeling_help.login_skin_style: Select the primary color of login page.
whitelabeling_help.login_background: Select the perfect background image for your login page.
whitelabeling_help.page_title: Change the text your users see in the window title.
whitelabeling_help.server_language: Set language preferences for your users.
whitelabeling_help.social_integration: Set up links to social media.
whitelabeling_help.wa_skin: Set up how WebAdmin looks on the inside.
whitelabeling_help.wa_skin_style: Choose the primary color of WebAdmin.
whitelabeling_help.wc_skin: Set up how WebClient looks on the inside.
whitelabeling_help.wc_skin_style: Choose the primary color of WebClient.
whitelabeling_help.search_query: Provide link to search engine of your choice where %%query%% will be replaced by search phrase entered by users. Example: https://www.google.com/#q=%%query%%+site:icewarp.com.
whitelabeling_help.banners: Place banner ads on your login screen and into WebClient.
whitelabeling_help.banner_url: Insert URL of a static image to be used as a banner.
whitelabeling_help.banner_code: Insert custom AdSense slot ID provided by the AdSense provider.
whitelabeling_help.login_banners: Use mobile alternative and full resolution images as ad banners or connect to an advertising network.
whitelabeling_help.webclient_banners: Place ads for various screen resolutions on the login page or at the bottom of the instant messaging contact list.
whitelabeling_help.custom_sign_up_fields: Select which vCard fields will be required during sign up.
whitelabeling_help.two_step_verification: Select verification method when users sign up.
whitelabeling_help.conferencing: Change the look of the conferencing app.
whitelabeling_help.conferencing_logo: Change the logo shown on the conferencing page. Supported image formats: JPG, PNG, GIF. Maximum file size: 20 MB.

preview.find_out_more: To find out more about IceWarp, visit

preview_icechat.sign_in_with: Sign in with your IceWarp WebClient account

resource_help.resource_members: Review resource members, add new members or remove current ones. Tick the appropriate box and click Select Action button to remove a member.

subscription.contact_our_support: You can contact our support within 24/7 hours per day
subscription.page_reload: Page needs to be reloaded in order to load new license

loginpage.no_cookie: Your browser doesn't allow javascript to create cookies
loginpage.sign_in_text: Sign in with an administrator account to manage domains and users
loginpage.visit_text: To find out more about IceWarp Server visit
loginpage.oops_text: WebAdmin is not compatible with your browser or device. For best experience use one of these modern browsers:
loginpage.auth_sent: We have sent you an email which contains a secure link. Clicking the link will let you access spam management for a limited time.

error.identical_email: You cannot assign your own username to another user in the same domain.
error.insufficient_rights: Insufficient rights to perform this action.
error.connection: Unable to reach server. Please check your internet connection or contact administrator.
error.action_failed: The requested action could not be performed
error.license_key_send_failed: Could not send the license key
error.password_numeric_chars: Not enough numeric characters in password
error.password_non_alpha_num_chars: Not enough non alphanumeric characters in password

fulltext_search.title: Fulltext Search
fulltext_search.not_configured: Fulltext Search engine is currently not configured

fulltext_search_wizard.heading: Fulltext Search Wizard
fulltext_search_wizard.search_helper1: IceWarp supports fulltext search that is available to users in WebClient interface, on mobile devices synchronized through ActiveSync and in desktop email clients that can search for emails through IMAP protocol.
fulltext_search_wizard.search_helper2: Fulltext Search engine consists of three components, each of them can run locally on the same system as IceWarp, or remotely, to offload CPU and storage utilization. You should carefully consider which setup will be the best for your use case. The three components are:
fulltext_search_wizard.scanner_helper: Scanner service reads data from email storage, parses out text of emails and sends the text to the fulltext search database. Scanner service needs access (at least with read permission) to the email storage of IceWarp. If Scanner is deployed on a remote server, mount the email storage to the same mount point as on the IceWarp server (%s).
fulltext_search_wizard.database_helper1: Database service maintains its own database for fulltext search metadata (index). The index is stored directly on filesystem and will occupy approximately 10-20% of the original size of IceWarp email storage (the actual size varies by the type of data). Database service operates on its own and does not need to have any access to email storage.
fulltext_search_wizard.database_helper2: Note: If you are going to change local Index storage folder, you should also manually move the existing index data to the new location (this operation cannot be done automatically).
fulltext_search_wizard.docconv_helper: Documents conversion service is responsible for extracting text from email attachments and from documents stored in WebClient or FileSync locations. IceWarp provides a preconfigured virtual server with Documents conversion service that can be deployed externally from server where IceWarp runs [recommended]. Documents conversion service can also run locally on the same IceWarp system, however in such case it may not be able to convert some document types. Documents conversion service operates on its own and does not need to have any access to email storage.
fulltext_search_wizard.docconv_remote: Connect to remote Documents conversion service
fulltext_search_wizard.summary_helper: You have now finished configuration of Fulltext Search engine components. Below is summary of your current configuration.
